class.name: MultiStartMultivariateOptimizer

javadoc.text: Multi-start optimizer. * This class wraps an optimizer in order to use it several times in * turn with different starting points (trying to avoid being trapped * in a local extremum when looking for a global one).
Create a multi-start optimizer from a single-start optimizer.
javadoc.param: starts Number of starts to perform. * If {@code starts == 1}, the result will be same as if {@code optimizer}is called directly.
generator Random vector generator to use for restarts.
javadoc.throws: NullArgumentException if {@code optimizer} or {@code generator}is {@code null}.

javadoc.return: a comparator for sorting the optima.
